level 0.name: Clumsy Dodge
level 0.description: Move one square in any direction, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC {DC}. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card. Double the DC of the above check to move two squares in a straight line.

level 0.name: Step
level 0.description:
Move two squares in any direction.

Return this card to your hand

level 0.name: Single Attack
level 0.description: From your hand, swap this card with any card with the 'Basic Attack' tag in either your overflow or discard. If you have another 'Single Strike' in your overflow, you may immediately draw it into your hand

level 0.name: Hard-Style Strike
level 0.description:
This card cannot be directly drawn

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square

Deal ({DMG}) damage.

level 0.name: Soft-Style Strike
level 0.description:
This card cannot be directly drawn

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square

Your target rolls a DC {DC} STR or AGL + 1d8 check. If they fail, they move one square in any direction, your choice, and your strikes against them next tick have +2 damage. If they fail by 2 or more, you may also give them the 'prone' card.

level 0.name: Dagger Strike
level 0.description:
This card cannot be directly drawn

Requires a dagger

Choose one of:
  • Deal ({ADV} adv: {DMG}) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
  • Deal ({Range ADV} adv: {Range DMG}) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.

level 0.name: Longsword Strike
level 0.description:
This card cannot be directly drawn

Requires a longsword

Choose one of:
  • Deal {DMG} damage, targeting a line of three squares.
  • Deal {DMG} damage, targeting a cone of two squares.

level 0.name: Megaton Hammer Strike
level 0.description:
This card cannot be directly drawn

Requires a giant hammer

Choose one of:
  • Overhand Strike: Deal STRd6 damage to a square within reach two of you. Anyone within one square of that must test AGL with DC (STR - 3) * 2 or fall prone
  • Sweep Strike: Deal (STR/2)d4 damage, targeting a cone of two squares.
. Lose 2 PRI on all actions next tick.

level 0.name: Shield Block
level 0.description:
Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Your shield takes damage from the attack. If it is destroyed, any leftover damage continues toward the original target

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: Focus
level 1.description: Add +2 priority to another of your cards activated this tick

level 1.name: Reckless Action
level 1.description: Add +1d6-2 priority to another of your cards activated this tick

level 1.name: Precise Strike
level 1.description: Add +4 to the priority against armor of another card you activate this tick

level 1.name: Parry
level 1.description:
Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Move one square toward the source of the attack. For the purposes of calculating the damage of that attack, subtract a total of {DMG} from whichever attributes of the attacker you see fit.

If you can set all of their relevant stats to 0, their card is cancelled, your attacker looses all their active AP, cannot refresh this tick, and, if you are in their square, you may move them to any adjacent square

level 1.name: Weapon Block
level 1.description:
Chose a 'strike' attack targeting your square or an adjacent square. Your weapon takes damage from the attack. If your weapon is destroyed, any leftover damage continues toward the original target

Return this card to your hand

level 1.name: QuickStep/Dodge
level 1.description:
Chose one of:
  • Move one square in any direction. Next action in this slot gains +1 priority.
  • Move two squares in a straight line, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC {DC}. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card.{Extras}.
  • Lose 2 priority on this card. Select any one non-area attack that is currently targeting your square. You are unaffected by it.


When this card is removed from your hand for any reason, you may immediately pull another copy of it from your pool.

level 2.name: Judo Toss
level 2.description:
Target: One creature that has, this tick, moved to your square or a square you are currently adjacent to.

Continue their movement one extra square (or two if the one would mean they end up in your square). They immedately lose all AP they currently have in play, and all non-mental cards they currently have on the field are discarded. They cannot refresh their hand this tick. They gain the 'prone' status
level 2.cost: 22 - EMP, min 12, half the time sunk into learning Parry counts for this as well

cards.name: Thick Skin
cards.description: DR 4. On any tick you use 'Chomp', reduce the PRI of this card to +0

cards.name: Chomp
cards.description:
Target: One forward square

Deal 1d4 + STR - 1 damage. If you deal damage, you can latch on to your target. Gain the 'latched on' effect, while your target gains the 'chomped' effect

cards.name: Rip
cards.description:
Target: One entity which you latched on to and have at least 8 bid tokens on

Deal STRd4 damage. Heal half the damage you dealt. If that would put you over maximum, gain 1/10th of the additional as permanent extra HP. Do not round -- extra bits add up over uses of this card

cards.name: Spawn
cards.description: Create 1d4 Minor Hunger Spirits adjancent to you.

cards.name: Feed
cards.description: Take 8 damage. Turn one Minor Hunger Spirit within your reach into a Medium Hunger Spirit

cards.name: Prone
cards.description:
You may not use 'movement' cards that do not also have the 'prone' tag.
Can be removed by spending 2 AP

cards.name: Grappled
cards.description:
Bid STR

As long as this card is in effect, cannot use any 'movement' cards. This card may be turned into 'Grappling' if you have at least one bid token on it

cards.name: Grappling
cards.description:
Bid STR

As long as this card is in effect, any 'movement' cards you use have 0 combo and affect both you and the person you are grappling. If you have at least one bid token on this card, you may chose to only affect yourself with movement cards. If you leave the square of the person you are grappling, discard this card.

You may turn this card's partner from 'Grappling' into 'Grappled' if you have at least your enemy's STR bid tokens on this card.

You may turn this card's partner from 'Grappled' into 'Pinned' if you have at least 2x your enemy's STR bid tokens on this card

cards.name: Pinned
cards.description:
Bid STR

As long as this card is in effect, cannot use any 'movement' or 'strike' cards. Your STR and TEC count as one lower for the purposes of bidding on this card. This card may be turned into 'Grappling' if you have at least one bid token on it

cards.name: Latching On
cards.description:
Bid STR + 2

As long as this card is in effect, you may not use any 'movement' or 'strike' cards. You may voluntarily discard this card by paying 1 AP with priority TEC + 4. This card is discarded if its paired 'Chomped' card is discarded

cards.name: Chomped
cards.description:
Bid STR

As long as this card is in effect, all 'movement' cards take + 1 AP, and apply to both you and the creature that has chomped you. All 'strike' cards have -1 priority. Each time you activate a 'movement' or 'strike' card, take 1d4-1 damage. Can be removed if you have at least one bid token on this card.

cards.name: Motorcycle Gear
cards.description: DR 2. Reduce your AGL by 3 - STR.

cards.name: Riot Gear
cards.description: DR 4. Reduce your AGL by 5 - STR.

cards.name: Faux Plate
cards.description: DR 5. Reduce your AGL by 3 - STR

cards.name: Full Plate
cards.description: DR 8. Reduce your AGL by 7 - STR.

manifested playfulness.name: Manifested Joy
manifested playfulness.description: Target the nearest MAG creatures within LEN/4. Each tick, use Extend Tendril toward each of your targets. If a target gets out of range, choose a new target.

manifested playfulness.name: Extend Tendril (P)
manifested playfulness.description: Invest one LEN. Extend this tendril one square toward the target. If you extend into a creature's square, move to 'Make Contact'

manifested playfulness.name: Make Contact (P)
manifested playfulness.description: Exploratorily prod the creature you have touched. If they do not rebuff you, move to 'Envelop'. If rebuffed, the entire tedril instantly retreats back to the central body. Gain back all invested LEN (burned LEN is not recovered). At any point after contact is made, your target can push the tendril away.

manifested playfulness.name: Envelop (P)
manifested playfulness.description: Invest one LEN. Wrap up the creature you have touched. The creature can stop you at any time. It takes 8 LEN to completely wrap up a human, but a creature can direct you to a specific wound/location for 1 LEN per wound. Once a wound is attended, use Heal, but keep enveloping until rebuffed or the target is entirely enveloped.

manifested playfulness.name: Heal (P)
manifested playfulness.description:
Use the following effect on each enveloped wound every 2d10 minutes:

Burn 8 LEN (as the solid joy pokes, prods, and eventually incorporates itself into the injury). Heal the target wound 1 HP. Target gains 2 Fatigue.

manifested ecstacy.name: Extend Tendril (E)
manifested ecstacy.description: Invest MAG LEN. Extend this tendril MAG squares toward the target. If your extend into a creature's sqaure, move to 'Envelop'

manifested ecstacy.name: Envelop (E)
manifested ecstacy.description: Attempt to envelop your target. Give them a 'Grappled' card. Bid MAG + 2 on this card. For each new bid token on this card at the end of the tick, invest 1 LEN, and deal 1d4 damage as the ecstacy wraps and crushes and burrows into whatever it catches. Once the creature is fully encased (a total of 8 bid tokens on a human creature), use Heal instead.

manifested ecstacy.name: Heal (E)
manifested ecstacy.description:
Use the following effect on each enveloped wound every tick:

Burn 4 LEN. Heal the target wound 1 HP. Unlike Playfulness, Ecstacy is unhindered by energy limits and healing does not give fatigue.

level 0.name: Channel Joy
level 0.description:
Target: Anyone within touch.

. Infuse 4 Joy into your target, and increase all of their stats by 1.

level 1.name: Manifest Joy (Playfulness)
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: N Joy

Create an iridescent blob of squishy material the size of a basketball. It acts according to the 'Manifested Playfulness' card/deck. It starts with a LEN of N*4, and a MAG of your mag when this card was activated.

level 1.name: Sunny Disposition
level 1.description: Whenever you would gain Joy, gain +1 Joy

level 1.name: The Party Don't Stop
level 1.description:
Target: Anyone willing within arm's reach.

Lock 2 Joy. Targt gains 1d4 + MAG/2 to their fatigue limit

level 1.name: Channel Joy+
level 1.description:
Target: Anyone within touch.

. Infuse up to 6 Joy into your target. for every 3 points locked, increase all of your tatget's stats by 1.

level 2.name: Sunny Disposition+
level 2.description: Whenever you would gain Joy, gain +1 Joy. Stacks with Sunny Disposition

level 3.name: Manifest Joy (Ecstacy)
level 3.description:
Cost to activate: N Joy

Create an iridescent blob of squishy material the size of a basketball.This is highly, highly compressed Joy. It acts according to the 'Manifested Esctacy' card/deck. It starts with a LEN of N, and a MAG of your mag when this card was activated.

level 0.name: Channel Anger
level 0.description:
Target: Anyone within touch.

. Infuse up to 4 Anger into your target. For every 2 points locked, increase your target's STR, or decrease their AGL or EMP, by 1.

level 1.name: Manifest Anger (Barb)
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 2 + N Anger

Create a cylindrical crystal the length and approximate shape of a tent spike. You may treat it as a dagger dealing 2d8 instead of 1d8 damage. For each additional point of Anger spent on this card, increase damage by 1d8

Anyone touching/holding/wielding the dagger takes 1d2 - 1 damage during the AP phase of each round.

If you are still connected to it and hit someone with this 'dagger', you may destory the dagger give them 1/2 of the Anger originally put into this card

level 1.name: Channel Anger+
level 1.description:
Target: Anyone within touch.

. Infuse up to 8 Anger into your target. For every 2 points locked, increase your target's STR, or decrease their AGL or EMP, by 1.

level 1.name: Festering Rage
level 1.description: Whenever you would gain Anger, gain +1 Anger

level 2.name: Manifest Collateral Damage
level 2.description:
Cost to activate: N*3 Anger

Cover N squares with manifested anger crystals. The squares must be contiguous and start adjacent to you. For each affected square a creature is occupying, it takes 2d8 damage.

Any creature in one of the affected squares or adjacent to one of the affected squares takes 1d4 damage from radiant heat (and anything easily flammable nearbye will likely catch on fire) during the AP phase. Using a movement card will break your connection with the anger. Direct (spike) damage does not affect you, but radiant damage does. If you are connected to the anger and a creature takes damage from occupying an affected square, you may destroy the anger to give 1/2 of the Anger originally put into this card spread evenly, to all affected creatures.

level 2.name: Festering Rage+
level 2.description: Whenever you would gain Anger, gain +1 Anger. Stacks with Festering Rage

level 3.name: Manifest Defensiveness
level 3.description:
Cost to activate: N Anger

Create a small patch of anger crystals on your skin, right where a blow is about to strike you. Decrease the damage from a non-area attack targeting you by N*6. Take 1d6 - 4 damage. (The manifested anger burns you if you're too slow to remove it and is sometimes in uncomfortable places).

Return this card to your hand

level 3.name: Unstoppable Rage
level 3.description: Take no negative effects from damage or lack of fatigue. When you take damage, pay N anger or discard this card, where N is number of health states you should have moved down

level 0.name: Channel Anticipation
level 0.description:
Target: Anyone within touch.

Infuse up to 6 Anticipation into your target. For every 3 points locked, increase your target's priority on all cards by 1.

level 1.name: Channel Anticipation+
level 1.description:
Target: Anyone within touch.

. Infuse up to 6 Anticipation into your target. For every 2 points locked, increase your target's priority on all cards by 1.

level 1.name: Forward Thinking
level 1.description: Whenever you would gain Anticipation, gain +1 Anticipation

level 1.name: Manifest Expectation
level 1.description:
Cost to activate: 2 + N Anticipation

Choose a trigger which you could, unaided, detect visually. A small black blob appears in your hand. Anyone who touches it can feel energy coursing around and around just below the black surface. If the trigger happens within line of sight of the blob, the blob instantly activates: its outer black material falls away, and a bright ball of light/energy (think ball lightning, maybe?) is revealed. It breaks contact with its caster and moves off toward whatever set it off, following them at the rate of one square per two MAG. When it gets there, it excitedly flits around them. Once active, it burns through 1 Anticipation every half hour.
This card can be recalled like any other manifestation.

level 2.name: Forward Thinking+
level 2.description: Whenever you would gain Anticipation, gain +1 Anticipation. Stacks with Forward Thinking

level 3.name: Manifest Vigilance
level 3.description:
Cost to activate: 8+ Anticipation (N)

Choose a trigger which has a theoretically measurable effect on the world. A small black blob appears in your hand. Anyone who touches it can feel absurd amounts of energy coursing around and around just below the black surface. If the trigger happens within line of sight, or within N squares, the blob instantly activates: its outer black material falls away, and a bright ball of light/energy (think ball lightning, maybe?) is revealed. It breaks contact with its caster and moves off toward whatever set it off, following them at the rate of two squares per MAG. When it gets there, it excitedly flits around the activator. Once active, it burns through 1 Anticipation every half hour.
This card can be recalled like any other manifestation.
